setup.use_case: To ensure a new project environment is configured correctly.
To verify the change management process is followed.

git.use_case: To enforce a standard format for git commit messages.
To maintain a consistent and clean branching strategy.

languages.use_case: To ensure Python code adheres to PEP8 style guidelines.
To validate the TypeScript configuration for a project.

security.use_case: To perform a general security audit on an application.
